description: This PHP source file manages the 'Edit Allowed Device' page for parental controls within a network management interface. It includes server-side logic for retrieving and processing device data, as well as embedded JavaScript for handling form interactions, validation, and AJAX requests for saving changes.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the form with device data, sets up event handlers and validation for the Allowed Device editing page.

methods.name: updateAllowTimeVisibility
methods.description: Enables or disables time selection inputs based on whether 'Always Allow' is checked.
